```{r,include=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("Larsvanderlaan/RStatisticalSoftware/hal9001")

```

```{r}
library(hal9001)
n=300
X = matrix(cbind(runif(n,-5,0),runif(n,0,5)), nrow=n)

y = rowSums(X)^3 -5 

f=fit_hal(X,y, max_degree =3, screen_basis_interactions=T,family = "gaussian", cv_select = T,  smoothness_orders = 3, include_order_zero = T, screen_basis_main_terms =F)

plot(predict(f, new_data = X),y)
#plot(X,predict(f, new_data = X))
length(f$basis_list)
```
